snippet: As the spring tourism season nears, the White House said it would cease offering tours starting on Saturday.
abstract: Obama administration will cancel all tours of the White House in an effort to reduce costs  in accordance with $85 billion in across-the-board spending cuts; constituents who want to visit the White House must go through their representatives to schedule a tour, so decision will force Congressional offices to turn away visitors hoping for a tour.
lead_paragraph: As the spring tourism season nears, the White House said it would cease offering tours starting on Saturday.

headline.seo: White House Suspending Tours Over Budget Cuts
headline.main: White House Tours Halted Over Cuts; Congress Says, ‘We’re Open’
headline.print_headline: White House Tours Halted Over Cuts; Congress Says, ‘We’re Open’
